title: Server disconnection
body:
Hey there, my internet connection at the moment is fantastic, no lag whatsoever.

However, today I have been consistently disconnecting from league servers for minutes at a time. Despite my connection remaining at optimal performance.

How can this issue be resolved?

replies.body: Even though you might have fantastic internet, you can still run into some trouble reaching specific services like the game servers.  Try the steps in our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help!   Make sure to go over each step to rule out any possibilities.  Test it out in a custom game and let me know if you have any questions!

Hey there, I've recently solved the problem just by changing my DNS preferences. However, today the exact same problem arised again, for what reason I don't know. I'm capable of running any online game, stream etc. without having any issues, yet only League is giving me problems. So clearly, the problem is on your guys' end. No one else in this household is experiencing problems so I'm really at a loss here.

Edit: I ran the hextech repair tool and the connection seems stable again, will report if I re-experience any issues

There hasn't been any issues with access to the servers, though I'm glad the HRT was able to assist.  It further suggests that a setting or blocking is failing to properly get you in-game, so it's really important that you go over each step of that connection guide.  Let me know if you still have issues after going through it.
